summary:
*Moneyball* is a 2011 movie about Billy Beane (Brad Pitt), the general manager of the Oakland Athletics baseball team. With a small budget, he and his assistant use a new way of analyzing players to build a winning team. It's based on a true story and a book by Michael Lewis.

The film had a long journey to the big screen. It faced many changes in directors and scripts. Finally, Bennett Miller directed it, and it became a hit. The movie was praised for its acting and was nominated for six Academy Awards.
title: Moneyball (film)
